direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle asset transfers between accounts but for different types (margin vs. futures).
Both methods involve transferring assets between accounts, making test cases for one applicable to the other.
Both methods involve asset transfer operations with similar parameter checks and control flows.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the RequestHandler to be initialized for sending signed requests.
Both methods require parameter checks before proceeding with the transfer operation.
Both methods need to verify the success of the transfer operation, handling similar exceptions.
